title: Titling Sans
content:
I have a logo for which I'm trying to track down the original typeface. It's reminiscent of something I've seen but I can't place it and am unable to get in touch with the original designer. Any idea what this might be?

Font: 

 Knockout 

Solved By: 

 [kthomps5](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317172212/http:/typophile.com/user/175823 "View user profile.")

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [Screen Shot 2014-09-19 at 3.39.13 PM.png](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317172212/http:/typophile.com/files/Screen%20Shot%202014-09-19%20at%203.39.13%20PM.png) | 45.62 KB |
author: JButts

comments.content:
Knockout 47 Bantamweight, by Hoefler & Co.:  
 [http://www.typography.com/fonts/knockout/overview/](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317172212/http:/www.typography.com/fonts/knockout/overview/ "http://www.typography.com/fonts/knockout/overview/")

I don't think there are italics for these faces, so the upper- and lowercase version must be artificially italicized.
Thanks! I thought immediately that the italics were an Illustrator manipulation. Appreciate the help.
